answers.answer: I also wanted to know what normal blood sugar levels are normal. I tested myself the other day and it was at 105. I took it in the morning after not eating or drinking anything for over 9 hours. Thank you.
According to the ADA a fasting blood glucose of less than 110 is normal, according to other sites it is less than 99 so it depends on who you check with,  hope this helps.

If you're concerned about diabetes, you really should get a fasting blood sugar level again, and make sure this time you don't eat anything for at least 10 hours before the test.As regards your urinary symptoms... sorry to say this, but I really, really, think that you absolutely, positively, no doubt about it, need to see a doc for tests and cultures for other possible causes... I know the exam and tests are not pleasant, but if anything else is going on, you really need to know and more importantly, NOT knowing and NOT getting treatment could result in really bad consequences... please see your doc and let her/him know everything...Best to you...

question: About a week ago i caught a urinary tract infection. Or atleast that is what i thought and was told that i had. It started off with blood in urine. Got antibiotics been taking them ever since. Since then i have had no bleeding. Only mild burning when i urinate. I also took cranberry juice as well to help it out some more. Since then it seems to be going away. So i don't know if these symptoms i am experiencing are related to my symptoms below.For the past few days i have been experiencing symptoms. I have had tingling in my forearms and my shins. As well as muscle aches on my upper leg and forearms. I don't believe i have excessive thirst. Usually drink around 4 cups of water throughout the entire day. Or frequent urination. Although i do have the feeling of wanting to urinate even after i have finished urinating. So i end up going to the bathroom because of it. Only to urinate it very little as if i didn't need to. My urine does have an odor but i don't know if these urinary symptoms are because of the urinary tract infection that i have.Sometimes i lose sleep over these symptoms. Mainly because i am overly worried and stressed about them. So i am hoping if i could get an opinion or advice please. Thank you for your time.
title: concerned of symptoms
